feature.label: Treez
feature.description: Treez is a set of Eclipse plugins for the creation of generic tree based user interfaces. Visit https://github.com/stefaneidelloth/treez/
feature.copyright: Treez Treez is a set of Eclipse plugins for the creation of generic tree based user interfaces. Visit https://github.com/stefaneidelloth/treez Copyright (c) 2016 Stefan Eidelloth Treez is based on technology from several projects and you have to consider their copyright notices, too. See the license agreement for more details.
feature.license:
Treez Software User Agreement 2016
TREEZ
Treez is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0. A copy of the EPL is available at http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html. The source code of Treez is available at https://github.com/stefaneidelloth/treez
APPLICABLE LICENSES
Treez is built upon a number of other open source technologies and products. Here is a list of those products with links to their licenses:
* Apache Commons (subset)
Treez is accompanied by a subset of Apache Commons, developed by the Apache Software Foundation. Treez includes the following files which are located in the lib directory of the org.treez.core plug-in: commons-exec-1.3.jar commons-logging-1.2.jar Your use of Apache Commons is subject to the terms and conditions of the Apache License, Version 2.0 ("Apache License"). A copy is available at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html. The source is available at the Apache Commons web site at http://commons.apache.org/dowloads.
* Apache Log4j
Treez is accompanied by Log4j, developed by the Apache Software Foundation. Treez includes the following files which are located in the lib directory of the org.treez.core plug-in: log4j-1.2.5.jar Your use of Apache Commons is subject to the terms and conditions of the Apache License, Version 2.0 ("Apache License"). A copy is available at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html. The source is available at the Apache Log4j web site at http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/download.html.
* Conrec
Treez is accompanied by Conrec, developed by Paul D. Bourke, Nicholas Yue, Bradley White Treez includes the following files which are located in the org.treez.results plug-in: Conrec.java Render.java
Your use of Conrec is subject to the terms and conditions of the conrec license. The license and the source code are available at http://paulbourke.net/papers/conrec/.
* D3.js
Treez is accompanied by D3.js, developed by Mike Bostock. Treez includes the following files which are located in the resources directory of the org.treez.javafxd3 plug-in: d3.min.js Your use of D3.js is subject to the terms and conditions of the D3.js license. A copy is available at https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/LICENSE. The source code is available at https://github.com/d3/d3.
* Function-Plot.js
Treez is accompanied by Function-Plot.js, developed by Mauricio Poppe. Treez includes the following files which are located in the resources directory of the org.treez.javafxd3 plug-in: function-plot.js Your use of Function-Plot.js is subject to the terms and conditions of the MIT license. A copy is available at https://mit-license.org/. The source code is available at https://github.com/maurizzzio/function-plot.
* GWT-D3
Treez is partially based on source from GWT-D3, developed by Anthony Schiochet and Eric Citaire. Most of the code of the plugin org.treez.javafxd3 has been adopted from GWT-D3. Your use of GWT-D3 is subject to the terms and conditions of the GWT-D3 license. A copy is available at https://github.com/gwtd3/gwt-d3/blob/master/LICENSE The source code is available at https://github.com/gwtd3/gwt-d3.
* JQuery
Treez is accompanied by JQuery, developed by jQuery Foundation and other contributors. Treez includes the following file which is located in the resources directory of the org.treez.javafxd3 plug-in: jquery-2.4.4.min.js Your use of JQuery is subject to the terms and conditions of the MIT License. A copy is available at http://jquery.org/license. The source code is available at https://jquery.com/download/
* Nebula
Treez is accompanied by a subset of Nebula Widgets, developed by the Eclipse Foundation. Treez includes the following files which are located in the lib directory of the org.treez.data plug-in org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.grid_1.0.0.201506151822.jar Your use of Nebula Widgets is subject to the terms and conditions of the the Eclipse Public License v1.0. A copy of the EPL is available at http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html. The source is available at the Nebula web site at https://eclipse.org/nebula/downloads.php.
* NVD3.js
Treez is accompanied by NVD3.js, developed by Novus Partners, Inc. Treez includes the following files which are located in the resources directory of the org.treez.javafxd3 plug-in: nv.d3.min.js nv.d3.min.css Your use of NVD3.js is subject to the terms and conditions of the Apache License, Version 2.0. A copy is available at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0. The source code is available at https://github.com/novus/nvd3.
* Plotly
Treez is accompanied by Plotly.js, developed by Plotly, Inc Treez includes the following file which are located in the resources directory of the org.treez.javafxd3 plug-in: plotly.min.js Your use of Plotly.js is subject to the terms and conditions of the MIT License. A copy is available at https://github.com/plotly/plotly.js/blob/master/LICENSE. The source code is available at https://github.com/plotly/plotly.js.
* Spring Expression Language (SpEL)
Treez is accompanied by the Spring Expression Language (SpEL) developed by Spring IO. Treez includes the following files which are located in the lib directory of the org.treez.core plug-in: spring-expression-4.1.6.RELEASE.jar spring-core-4.1.6.RELEASE.jar Your use of Spring Expression Language is subject to the terms and conditions of the Apache License, Version 2.0 ("Apache License"). A copy is available at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html. The source is available at the maven repository: http://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework/spring-expression/4.1.6.RELEASE http://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework/spring-core/4.1.6.RELEASE
IT IS YOUR OBLIGATION TO READ AND ACCEPT ALL SUCH TERMS AND CONDITIONS PRIOR TO USE OF THIS CONTENT
